title: Science for the tropics
creator_credit: Technical and Scientific Films, Richard Tamblind and Tony Baker
brief_description: A look at the work of the Tropical Products Institute in London, an organisation which assists third world countries to exploit their natural resources commercially. The Institute also does much laboratory work relating to agricultural issues. The film contains quite technical examinations of several projects the Institute has been involved in.
